name: Dark GOD
additional_info:
Requires disabling CSP in versions of Firefox < 59, but that's on you:
- goto about:config
- search "security.csp.enable"
- Disable it.
Themes only god site
For Dark SceneGames, install this theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/154518/dark-scenegames
[4/8/2019]
-added new domain: http://goggamespc7v6z5e.onion/
[12/11/2018]
-GoodOldDownloads has shut down 
-become open source
-https://god-games.com/ is a decent replacement(ty)
[05/02-04/2018]
-Small fixes that make all the difference ;)
[18/03/2018]
-Was waiting for a standardization of the icons for different hosters, but it looks like that's not a priority. Added workaround for now..
-Make things a bit more pretty around there. ;)
[09/03/2018]
-Instead of removing the background we make the image a lot darker for a more complete dark theme ;)
-Small tweak to changelog backgrounds
[24/01/2018]
-Added rules for release view
-Added rules for drop down menu
